543650.name: Last Days
543650.description:
Save or enslave? "Last Days" is a survival, zombie, horror, rpg game where every choice matters and will affect you long term. Scavenge for materials and weapons in post-apocalyptic Maine. This is not an easy task however, zombies search even the most Rural areas to find food. The story of "Last Days" creates itself based on your actions and words. Making good choices to better your people ultimately will bring you victory. Assemble a crew to perform certain tasks and make your own outpost. Find survivors in the area and make them your slaves or citizens. What kind of story will you make?

Key Features:
-Branching Storyline
-Multiple Endings
-Outpost Creation
-Crafting
-Beautiful Pixel Art

GAME IS NOT COMPLETE

This game has been abandoned. Due to an unfixable error and lack of backups due to my incompetence. The game is free now but to be honest, it's very bland.
